en.title: 4,000 Attend Dr Emoto's Seminar In Bangkok 04th April 2010! (1)
en.content:
A HUGE crowd of 4,000 FE Leaders, Members, VIPs and invited guests turned up at JJ Mall, Bangkok, on 04th April 2010 to listen to world renowned scientist Dr Masaru Emoto's keynote lecture on "The Power Of Scalar Energized Water". VIPs who attended include General Dato Kitti Rattanachaya (former Army Commander of Southern Thailand), Professor Dr Wichit Bunyahotara (Scientist and former Head of Chemistry Department, Chulalongkorn University), Dr Sombat Metthanee (renowned Thai actor), Pratan Sutabutra (father in law of Thai Finance Minister), Police Major General Angkoon Arthornphatai, Surachai Sombatcharoen (well known Singer) and many more.

Highlights Of The Event Include:
 
- Marching in of VIPs.
   
- Welcome Speech by Thailand Country Licensee Don Chan.
   
- Opening of Seminar by Professor Dr Wichit Bunyahotara who also announced his research and studies on the power of FE's Quantum Pendant and how it has helped many people improve their health in Thailand.
   
- Dr Amir Farid's talk on "What is Scalar Energy?"
   
- Dr Masaru Emoto's keynote lecture "The Power of Scalar Energized Water".
   
- Mock Cheque presentation Baht 30,000 to rebuild local school in NE Thailand, which was destroyed by fire.
   
- Demonstrations on the power of FE's Quantum Pendant by Presidential Director Sam Ho and Don Chan.
50% of the crowd was first timers and they were very impressed by the demonstrations!
   
- Lucky Draws of 10 Quantum Watches and brand New Toyota Vios.
   
- Presentation of key to Winner of Brand New Toyota Vios, FE Leaders from Chiangmai, husband and wife Team, Ms Nichita Seang-Sa-Aad and Mr Pon Sengsa-Aad. FE is very happy for the couple that only recently joined FE. They, like many, are struggling financially and finding it hard to make ends meet. They decided to do FE's business full time after Ms Nichita who was suffering from cancer, and who was blind, used FE's Quantum Pendant and Quantum Flask and found it helped her. Many in the audience were moved to tears when she gave her testimonial and acceptance speech on the stage. There could not be a more deserving couple! Congratulations, Nichita and Pon!
 
< Click Here For More Photos >

Highlights Of The Event Include:

meta.author: KLHunter
